mapper.sql: id, parent_id, standard_product_unit_id, att_name_id, sort_value, type, create_time, update_time, platform_id, show_picture
mapper.select: SELECT spuan.id, spuan.parent_id, spuan.standard_product_unit_id, spuan.att_name_id, spuan.sort_value, spuan.type, spuan.platform_id, an.`name` att_name, an.`mode`, andl.unit FROM standard_product_unit_att_name spuan LEFT JOIN attribute_name an on an.id = spuan.att_name_id LEFT JOIN attribute_name_decimal andl on andl.attribute_name_id = spuan.att_name_id WHERE spuan.type = 3 and spuan.standard_product_unit_id = #{standardProductUnitId} ORDER BY spuan.id

SELECT spuan.id, spuan.parent_id, spuan.standard_product_unit_id, spuan.att_name_id, spuan.show_picture, spuan.sort_value, spuan.type, spuan.platform_id, an.`name` att_name, an.`mode`, andl.unit FROM standard_product_unit_att_name spuan LEFT JOIN attribute_name an on an.id = spuan.att_name_id LEFT JOIN attribute_name_decimal andl on andl.attribute_name_id = spuan.att_name_id LEFT JOIN standard_unit su on su.standard_product_unit_id = spuan.standard_product_unit_id WHERE spuan.type = 2 and su.id = #{standardUnitId} ORDER BY spuan.id
